On Wed, 2003-10-01 at 23:32, Daniel Paul Hightower wrote:
> I haven't played that much with a team with both an elf and thief on 
> the same team because the elf will run off and get himself killed 
> while thief would kill himself and the rest of my team.

I was once playing with a dude that wasn't too great at Gladiator, so
just to have fun we both started cheating like crazy. I don't remember
what class he was, but I was a thief. We both got really powerful, and
for some reason we hired a slime, which proceeded to multiply itself
many many times over. To take care of the problem of having so many
allies, I had him run as far as he could, then I summoned the computer
allies to me, laid a whole lot of bombs, released the computers, and
ran. Five seconds later, there were only two of us on the team again :-)

- Yan
